blog.name: tyrusmagocious
blog.title: Father, The Son, & The Holy Tyrus

summary: Fic Title Game: "2 Cool 2 be 4gotten"
question: Fic Title Game: "2 Cool 2 be 4gotten"
answer:
An unfortunate event that made Cyrus wakes up every morning with no memory of his life from his teen years onwards.

TJ helps him remember everything by taking him to the places they always go to, re-doing his list, and listening to their favorite music.

blog.name: captainkippen
blog.title: you can be oblivious
blog.description: aaron • he/him • requests are open • fic masterlist • icon by simplycyrus

summary: I'm the last anon. Tyrus pls??
question: I'm the last anon. Tyrus pls??
answer:
Aye aye cap’n.

Lookalike

– a tyrus fic

Cyrus curses his own lack of self-control as he closes Instagram. He hadn’t meant to go looking for TJ’s profile, he’d opened the app to scroll mindlessly, but somehow he’d found his fingers tapping in that familiar username and hitting search before he could stop them.

It showed him what he’d expected; picture after picture of TJ and his new boyfriend holding hands or dancing or exploring on one of their many sweet dates. The way TJ’s grin spreads wide across his face sends a pang through Cyrus’ heartstrings. His misses being the one to inspire that smile. It’s been a long time since they broke up, almost a year since everything fell to pieces hard and fast, the end transpiring in the form of a door-slamming argument in the kitchen of an apartment that wasn’t even theirs. It’s been a long time, but Cyrus can’t seem to forget. He doesn’t really want to.

Some nights he lets himself pretend for a moment that there’s nothing to forget, that they never broke up, and things are the same as they were before. He thinks back to the summer nights they spent walking along the sand of the Californian beaches they road-tripped too, remembers TJ pulling him into the shadows between the city streetlights to kiss him, back to all those days spent lost in each other’s eyes. Then, after allowing those precious moments, he sighs and tells himself to remember how it’s over. They’ve only spoken a few times since that argument, police conversation after bumping into one another or sparse texts to check in on one another with promises to catch up and plans that never come into fruition. They were meant to stay friends but at some point, they slipped into becoming barely-acquaintances. He hates that.

It might actually be easier for him to move on if TJ had just stayed single. Or maybe if Cyrus hadn’t seen that first picture of them together two months ago it wouldn’t be such a problem. He had been doing a fine job of pretending TJ didn’t exist until then.

The problem is that TJ’s boyfriend, Mitch is his name, looks eerily similar to Cyrus. Same dark hair, same dark eyes, not quite enough eyebrow. After seeing him it sent Cyrus into a spiral of unwanted thoughts; does TJ see the resemblance? When he’s looking into Mitch’s eyes is he seeing Cyrus’?

According to Buffy and Marty, TJ talks about Mitch all the time. He’s ‘sickeningly’ in love with him, he’s moved on, he doesn’t feel that way for Cyrus any longer because he’s found a new perfect person to love. A selfish part of Cyrus hopes he’s faking it. The less decent part of him wants TJ to miss him so much he’s gone out and found a replacement that reminds him just enough of Cyrus to get by. That’s probably not the case but it’s a vindicating thought nonetheless.

It’s ridiculous because he’s well aware of the irony here. He spends all his time thinking of TJ t the moment, obsessing, and hoping that TJ is thinking of him right back. He never admits it out loud, the others think he’s moved on, but he misses him so much some days that it hurts. There’s a TJ shaped hole in his life and he doesn’t know how to fill it. Maybe he needs a replacement of his own. A lookalike.

He’s tried dating. Blind dates, setups by mutual friends, tinder. Nice guys come and go as they please, at work he meets plenty of interested parties, but none of them really catch his attention all that much. It’s awful an awful thought but sometimes he worries that TJ was his only chance at real romantic fulfilment. Maybe there really is only one person out there for everybody, and his one person went and found somebody else after walking right out of his life.

He reopens the app and hates himself as he does so. He just needs one more look, just one more check, and then maybe he can put these thoughts away for good. He needs to focus on getting out there and finding his own life without TJ.

If only he knew that right then at that moment, TJ was missing him just the same.

summary:

summary: I am sad again now. Watching 2x20 and Cyrus tells the end of the story of Bubby Rose’s hip replacement, that makes the episode...
body: I am sad again now. Watching 2x20 and Cyrus tells the end of the story of Bubby Rose’s hip replacement, that makes the episode even more emotional but despite that, I can’t wait to get to it in my re-watching. Also gonna have TJ taking Cyrus to the Gym next which is great as I’ve only seen the episode once.
